privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: At Cheetah, we take your privacy seriously. This policy describes what personal information we collect and how we use it.

dataCollection.title: 1. Information We Collect
dataCollection.description: We collect various types of information to provide and improve our services:

personal.title: Personal Information
personal.description: Name, email address, and contact details

usage.title: Usage Data
usage.description: Interaction with our platform, features used, and preferences

technical.title: Technical Data
technical.description: IP address, browser type, device information

dataUsage.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
items: Process your transactions and maintain your account
Analyze usage patterns to improve our platform

dataProtection.title: 3. Data Protection
dataProtection.description: We implement robust security measures to protect your data:

yourRights.title: 4. Your Rights
yourRights.description: You have several rights regarding your personal data:
items: Object to processing of your data
Download a copy of your data

contactUs.title: 5. Contact Us
contactUs.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

card.title: Easily manage your workflow and tasks. Make your projects tangible.

header.title: Welcome to Cheetah
